item.title: 10/3: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Behind the judge's reasoning for Sean "Diddy" Combs' sentencing; Reporter's Notebook: Trump rebrands words as tools of power.

item.title: 10/3: CBS Evening News
item.description: Everything we know about Sean "Diddy" Combs' sentencing on prostitution-related charges; Pudge the cat steals the show at Bowling Green football games...

item.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs sentenced to over 4 years for prostitution-related charges
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs' sentencing hearing was held three months after he was convicted ​on two prostitution-related charges.

item.title: 10/3: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: White House eyes mass layoffs amid stalled government funding. Also, Taylor Swift drops new album, “The Life of a Showgirl."

item.title: 10/3: The Daily Report
item.description: Nancy Chen reports on the sentencing of Sean "Diddy" Combs, Hamas partially accepting a peace deal outlined by President Trump, and more.
